ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the training email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Viasat", ISBLANK(Training_Email_Sent__c), ISPICKVAL(Submitted_to_Viasat__c, "Complete"), ISBLANK(Viasat_Training_Username__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the Viasat Training Username field is filled in before saving the record.
